title: Steering Gear, Replace

steps.text: Remove hard top or soft top from vehicle
Raise vehicle
Raise and support front of vehicle from hoist

substeps.text: Install 2x chock to rear road wheel

steps.text: Lower vehicle to suitable working height
Remove front road wheel, from left side

substeps.text: Use special socket located under front bonnet
Remove 4x wheel bolt

steps.text: Remove left tie-rod end from left steering arm

substeps.text: Remove, then discard nut

steps.text: Remove front road wheel, from right side

substeps.text: Use special socket located under front bonnet
Remove 4x wheel bolt

steps.text: Remove right tie-rod end from right steering arm

substeps.text: Remove, then discard nut

steps.text: Lower vehicle
Release steering gear from steering column

substeps.text: Remove 2x nut, 2x bolt (1) from lower universal joint
Remove nut, bolt (2) from upper universal joint

steps.text: Release steering gear from bulkhead

substeps.text: Remove 2x lower bolt (4) for steering gear
Remove 2x upper bolt (3) for steering gear

steps.text: Remove lower universal joint and pinion shaft
Remove pinion shaft grommet from bulkhead
Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Remove steering gear from vehicle

substeps.text: Lift both ends of steering gear, then move steering gear to
Lower steering gear, then rotate to remove pinion from
Withdraw steering gear from right side of vehicle

steps.text: Install new steering gear to vehicle from right side Note: 2x technician required.

substeps.text: Raise steering gear, then rotate to install pinion to

steps.text: Lower vehicle
Install steering gear to bulkhead

substeps.text: Install 2x lower bolt to steering gear, loose fit
Install 2x upper bolt to steering gear, loose fit

steps.text: Install pinion shaft grommet to bulkhead
Install lower universal joint and pinion shaft

substeps.text: Check straight ahead position, then align match marks
Install 2x nut, 2x bolt to lower universal joint 35 Nm
Install nut, bolt to upper universal joint 35 Nm

steps.text: Secure 2x upper bolt for steering gear 45 Nm

substeps.text: Secure 2x lower bolt for steering gear 22 Nm

steps.text: Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Install right tie-rod end to right steering arm

substeps.text: Install new nut 30 Nm

steps.text: Install left tie-rod end to left steering arm

substeps.text: Install new nut 30 Nm

steps.text: Install front roadwheel to left side

substeps.text: Install 4x bolt 90 Nm
Use special socket located under front bonnet

steps.text: Install front roadwheel to right side

substeps.text: Install 4x bolt 90 Nm
Use special socket located under front bonnet

steps.text: Lower vehicle to hoist

substeps.text: Remove 2x chock from rear road wheel

steps.text: Lower vehicle
Install hard top or soft top to vehicle
Check steering wheel and front wheel alignment - see operation “Front Wheel Geometry” and “Straight Ahead Position, Check and Adjust”

torqueValues.component: Install lower universal joint and pinion shaft
Secure 2x upper bolt for steering gear 45 Nm
Secure 2x upper bolt for steering gear 45 Nm
Install right tie-rod end to right steering arm
Install left tie-rod end to left steering arm
Install front roadwheel to left side
Install front roadwheel to right side
Install 2x nut, 2x bolt to lower universal joint 35 Nm
Secure 2x lower bolt for steering gear 22 Nm

notes:
Remove, then discard nut
 Use commercially
available joint separator.

Remove nut, bolt (2) from upper universal joint
 Apply match mark
to upper and lower universal joints.

Lift both ends of steering gear, then move steering gear to
right side of vehicle

Lower steering gear, then rotate to remove pinion from
bulkhead
 2x technician

Withdraw steering gear from right side of vehicle
 2x technician
required.

Install new steering gear to vehicle from right side
 2x technician

bulkhead
 Note:   2x technician

Raise steering gear, then rotate to install pinion to
bulkhead
 2x technician

Install 2x upper bolt to steering gear, loose fit
 Use recommended
thread locking compound.
 Note:   2x technician
